title: [Large-Scale] Blended Learning Design for Internationalization of Higher Education in the Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with remote learning tools
context.additional_context: Focused on Addressing Challenges Faced by Learners with International Backgrounds in Pandemic Conditions While Combining Remote and Face-to-Face Learning. Explores VR Simulations to Experience Global Collaboration Environments and Apply Blended Learning Models

learning_goals: Learners can perform collaborative projects with international team members in a VR-based simulation environment
Learners can compare and explain the advantages/disadvantages of three internationalization strategies for higher education during pandemics
Learners can identify five or more cultural/technological factors to consider when designing blended learning
Learners can propose improvement plans for remote education based on project-based assessment results

resources: Real-time video conferencing tools (Zoom, Microsoft Teams)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
